thread.title: Supreme Releases Video Interview With Mike Hill Discussing Upcoming Collab
thread.title_full: Supreme Releases Video Interview With Mike Hill Discussing Upcoming Collab

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Supreme Releases Video Interview With Mike Hill Discussing Upcoming Collab
text:
For SS17, Supreme follows up a collaboration with Lacoste to work alongside Alien Workshop co-founder Mike Hill . The new project finds Hill working on an array of skate decks and tees, all of which boast the skate veteran’s signature, weirdo artwork.
In further promotion of the collab, Supreme has just released a new video interview with the man himself. In the clip you will see and hear Mike discussing how he got into macheting, graphic design, not knowing what he was doing initially, hating his work, past projects and more.
Press play below for Supreme’s recent interview with Mike Hill.
